alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Weakley, northeastern Gibson and western Carroll Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atwood, or near Milan, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milan, McKenzie, Greenfield, Bradford, Atwood, Trezevant, McLemoresville, Howley, Tuckers Corner, Jarrell, New Zion, Cades, Ledbetter, Skullbone, Hinkledale, Crowley Store, Staffords Store, Pillowville, Holly Leaf and Whitthorne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
